title: Identify metabolites based on MS1 or MS/MS database — identify_peak
code: identify_peak(   idx,   ms1.info,   ms2.info,   spectra.info,   spectra.data,   ppm.ms1match = 25,   ppm.ms2match = 30,   mz.ppm.thr = 400,   ms2.match.tol = 0.5,   rt.match.tol = 30,   ms1.match.weight = 0.25,   rt.match.weight = 0.25,   ms2.match.weight = 0.5,   total.score.tol = 0.5,   adduct.table,   candidate.num = 3,   fraction.weight = 0.3,   dp.forward.weight = 0.6,   dp.reverse.weight = 0.1,   remove_fragment_intensity_cutoff = 0,   ... )

title: Identify metabolites based on MS1 or MS/MS database — identify_peak
text: idx idx ms1.info ms1.info ms2.info ms2.info spectra.info spectra.info spectra.data spectra.data ppm.ms1match ppm.ms1match ppm.ms2match ppm.ms2match mz.ppm.thr Accurate mass tolerance m/z error calculation. ms2.match.tol MS2 match (MS2 similarity) tolerance. rt.match.tol weight matched fragments. ms1.match.weight Forward dot product weight. rt.match.weight Reverse dot product weight. ms2.match.weight RT match tolerance. total.score.tol polarity data, "positive""negative". adduct.table Collision energy. Please confirm CE values database. Default "". candidate.num "hilic" (HILIC column) "rp" (reverse phase). fraction.weight weight MS1 match total score calculation. dp.forward.weight weight RT match total score calculation. dp.reverse.weight weight MS2 match total score calculation. remove_fragment_intensity_cutoff remove_fragment_intensity_cutoff ... parameters
